armorstatues.dataSync.failure: Unable to modify armour stand data: %s
armorstatues.dataSync.finished: Finished sending queued armour stand data
armorstatues.screen.vanillaTweaks.checkT: Highlights the closest armour stand within three blocks of the player which will be adjusted. Due to how data packs work, builder isn't necessarily the armour stand which opened builder menu.
armorstatues.screen.vanillaTweaks.lock.d: Locking an armour stand prevents it from being changed using builder menu and disables interaction with the equipment slots.
armorstatues.screen.vanillaTweaks.swapMa: Swaps items between the main hand and helmet equipment slots.
Swaps items between the main hand and off hand equipment slots.
armorstatues.screen.vanillaTweaks.toolRa: Align an armour stand with a tripwire hook on the wall above it so that a tool held by it appears to be hanging up. Also locks the armour stand and disables all slots except the mainhand.
armorstatues.screen.vanillaTweaks.unlock: Unlocking an armour stand reverts any adjustments made via a previous lock action.
